title: Social Media Manager
job_overview:
As a Social Media Manager, you’ll play a key role in shaping and growing the online presence of our eCommerce brands. This position is urgent, and we’re looking for someone who can start immediately.

Key Responsibilities
- Develop engaging content strategies for different brands based on their identity and audience.
- Curate daily content ideas and ensure they are relevant and aligned with brand goals.
- Plan and schedule content across platforms to ensure consistent posting.
- Create, curate, and manage content (images, videos, and written posts) for social media.
- Work closely with our editors and designers to produce high-quality, on-brand content.
- Write creative and engaging captions in fluent U.S. English.
- Coordinate with project managers and marketing team to align content with campaign goals.
- Collaborate with editors and designers to ensure smooth content production and consistency.
- Maintain a consistent voice, tone, and visual style across all social media platforms.
- Propose fresh content ideas to improve engagement, grow the audience, and build brand awareness.

Working Schedule:
- Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (Philippine Time, UTC+8).
- Communication primarily via Slack.
